title: Slayer task/Basilisks

properties.name: description
properties.value: Basilisks can be assigned as a slayer task at level 40 Slayer, level 40 combat, and level 20 Defence by various slayer masters. They are found in the Fremennik Slayer Dungeon and Jormungand's Prison, the latter of which can only be accessed after completion of The Fremennik Exiles. Jormungand's Prison also contains Basilisk Knights, a more difficult version of Basilisks with more difficult mechanics and better drops. Players must equip a mirror shield or V's shield when fighting any Basilisk variant.

Basilisks can be assigned as a slayer task at level 40 Slayer, level 40 combat, and level 20 Defence by various slayer masters. They are found in the Fremennik Slayer Dungeon and Jormungand's Prison, the latter of which can only be accessed after completion of The Fremennik Exiles. Jormungand's Prison also contains Basilisk Knights, a more difficult version of Basilisks with more difficult mechanics and better drops. Players must equip a mirror shield or V's shield when fighting any Basilisk variant.

Slayer Unlocks[edit | edit source]

Main article: Slayer reward point
Unlock Points cost Notes
Basilocked 80 Konar, Duradel and Nieve will be able to assign Basilisks as your task.
Bigger and Badder 150 Increase the risk against certain slayer monsters with the chance of a superior version spawning whilst on a slayer task.
Basilonger 100 Number of Basilisks assigned is increased to 200-250.

Monster Variants[edit | edit source]

Monster Combat level Slayer XP Locations Notes
Basilisk 61 75
  • Fremennik Slayer Dungeon
  • Jormungand's Prison
  • Standard Basilisks.
Monstrous basilisk 135 1,700
  • Fremennik Slayer Dungeon
  • Jormungand's Prison
  • Superior slayer monster variant, which has a chance of spawning on a Basilisk's death after purchasing the Bigger and Badder unlock for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.
Basilisk Knight 204 300
  • Jormungand's Prison
  • More difficult version of Basilisks available to fight after completion of The Fremennik Exiles.
  • For more information on fighting Basilisk Knights, see Basilisk Knight/Strategies.
Basilisk Sentinel 358 5,590
  • Jormungand's Prison
  • Superior slayer monster variant, which has a chance of spawning on a Basilisk Knight's death after purchasing the Bigger and Badder unlock for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.
The Jormungand 363 600
  • Jormungand's Prison
  • Fought during The Fremennik Exiles, can only be fought once.

Location Comparison[edit | edit source]

Location Maplink Amount Multicombat Cannonable Safespotable Notes
Fremennik Slayer Dungeon 8 Basilisks No No Yes
Jormungand's Prison 12 Basilisks
19 Basilisk Knights 		No No Yes[1]
  • Contains both Basilisks and Basilisk Knights.
  • Only accessible after completion of The Fremennik Exiles.
  1. ^ Basilisk knights will still retaliate with magic, but it is possible to prevent their melee attacks using a safespot.
